variables.name: aerosol_optical_thickness_550
variables.description: ESA Aerosol Climate Change Initiative (Aerosol_cci): Level 3 aerosol products from AATSR (ensemble product), Version 2.6
variables.license: Terms and conditions of the DeepESDL data distribution
processing_steps: Loading data using the cciodp xcube data store
Upsampling to 0.25 degrees using nearest neighbor
